openGraph.title: Sleep Cycle Planner
openGraph.description: Plan bedtimes or wake-up times based on 90-minute sleep cycles and a gentle fall-asleep buffer.

title: Sleep Cycle Planner
description: Pick a target wake-up or bedtime and get recommended times based on 90-minute cycles.
modeWake: I want to wake up at
modeBed: I want to go to bed at
hint: Assumes {{cycle}}-minute cycles and {{buffer}} minutes to fall asleep.
empty: Choose a time to see your sleep cycle options.
